name: Wormly - a snake game
description:
This game "Wormly" is a really simple clone of the famous Nokia game "Snake".

You can play it in the browser.

I made this game as a challenge. Build a game on only one day. The most important reason to do this is to get more experience in using Pico8 as my primary game jam tool. 

This game is not perfect. A lot of code could be done much better. But this will be part of my next exercises in making game with Pico8.

If you want to help me out for doing more stuff like that, you could pay me a coffee or two :) 

Thanks for playing this strange stuff :D
